english.segment1: Another day in the hurt. Another grope in the search. Another shove with a smirk. Once more treading, running, pleading, pushing onto. Another bridge through the mist. Another hole in the midst. Another edge to the cliff. With her soft, sweet, subtle final kiss
english.segment2: Say, say, say what you will. So sorry. I will never be confined to follow you. So sorry. So you can say, say, say what you will. So sorry. Despite your offer there is nothing in you for me
english.segment3: Another stab in the dark, yeah. Another stake through the heart, yeah. Another plea to depart. Now I'm reaching forward, racing to her arms. And with a cruel embrace, yeah. Another end to the chase, yeah. Another falling from grace. Into cunning, cold, crafty web of lace
english.segment4: Say, say, say what you will. So sorry. I will never be confined to follow you. So sorry. So you can say, say, say what you will. So sorry. Despite your offer there is nothing in you for me
english.segment5: Sink in her wine. Why would I want anyone else?. She took from me. My everything. My everything
english.segment7: So sorry, so sorry, so sorry for all this. So sorry, so sorry, so sorry for all of this. I wish that things could have been so very different for us. I wish that you could have been, I wish that you could have been, I wish that you could have been my everything. So sorry. So long. It's been so real
